duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach robot-building classes to groups of children, introducing basic engineering concepts and guiding them in building their own robots.
Manage a classroom of children for robot-building sessions, promoting confidence and inclusivity.
Ensure classes stay on time and within agreed-upon time limits, troubleshoot robot issues, and foster a positive and fun learning environment.
Coordinate with other teachers, clients, and parents on site, and report feedback to appropriate channels.
Learn how to build different projects and travel to different locations to teach classes, keeping tools organized and stocked.
Attend paid training, shadow senior teachers, and obtain CPR/First Aid certification.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education, Child Development, or a related field
